name: Get correct content in the Widget endpoint (example #2)
fullName: Get correct content in the Widget endpoint (example #2)

steps.name: Before
Given I give a widget header with valid information
wrap {referer: https://www.lodgify.com/}
as ("headers")
When I submit a request GET to "Widget Endpoint" with "e8e3hqjgonkltkcbe0l9" id
get @headers
request ("{ method: 'GET', url: 'https://omapi.lodgify.com/api/v2/embed/2'... 25 more characters, headers: { referer: 'https://www.lodgify.com/' }, failOnStatusCode: false }")
wrap Object{8}
as ("response")
Then The response status should be 200
get @response
its .status
assert expected **200** to equal **200**
And I successfully receive the widget information with "e8e3hqjgonkltkcbe0l9" id
get @response
its .body
assert expected **{ Object (id, views, ...) }** to have property **id**

parameters.name: actual

steps.name: assert expected **{ Object (id, views, ...) }** to have property **id** of **e8e3hqjgonkltkcbe0l9**
assert expected **{ Object (id, views, ...) }** to have property **status**

parameters.name: actual

steps.name: assert expected **{ Object (id, views, ...) }** to have property **status** of **active**
assert expected **{ Object (id, views, ...) }** to have property **type**

parameters.name: actual

steps.name: assert expected **{ Object (id, views, ...) }** to have property **type** of **floating**
assert expected **{ Object (id, views, ...) }** to have property **namespace**

parameters.name: actual

steps.name: assert expected **tahoka** to be a string
assert expected **{ Object (id, views, ...) }** to have property **updated_at**

parameters.name: actual

steps.name: assert expected **2025-09-17 13:01:24** to be a string
assert expected **[ Array(1) ]** to be an array
assert expected **[ Array(1) ]** not to be empty
assert expected **{ Object (id, url, ...) }** to have property **id**
assert expected **{ Object (id, url, ...) }** to have property **id** of **week-4**
assert expected **{ Object (id, url, ...) }** to have property **url**
assert expected **https://a.optinmonster.com/app/campaign-views/81b293cfa536/e8e3hqjgonkltkcbe0l9/0778158a4c30240b736a6aa84496fc91-week-4.json** to include **e8e3hqjgonkltkcbe0l9**
assert expected **[ Array(1) ]** to be an array
assert expected **[ Array(1) ]** not to be empty
assert expected **{ Object (id, domain, ...) }** to have property **domain**
assert expected **{ Object (id, domain, ...) }** to have property **domain** of **lodgify.com**
assert expected **{ Object (plan, inBeta, ...) }** to have property **plan**
assert expected **{ Object (plan, inBeta, ...) }** to have property **plan** of **vbp_custom**
assert expected **{ Object (plan, inBeta, ...) }** to have property **features**
assert expected **[ remove-branding, smart-tags ]** to include **remove-branding**
assert expected **{ Object (mobile, interaction_cookie_duration, ...) }** to have property **auto_toggle**
assert expected **{ Object (mobile, interaction_cookie_duration, ...) }** to have property **bg_close**
assert expected **[ Array(3) ]** to be an array

parameters.name: actual

steps.name: assert expected **[ Array(3) ]** not to be empty

parameters.name: actual

steps.name: assert expected **{ Object (id, name, ...) }** to have property **name**
